info.name: KCS Reminder API
info.description: Self-reminder API with push notifications. Create, manage, and receive notifications for personal reminders with support for one-time, daily, and weekly frequencies.

request.description:
Create a new personal reminder with push notifications.

**Request Body:**
- `title` (required): Reminder title (1-200 characters)
- `note` (optional): Additional notes (max 1000 characters)
- `reminder_date` (required): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format
- `reminder_time` (required): Time in HH:mm format (24-hour)
- `frequency` (required): "one_time", "daily", or "weekly"
- `is_am` (optional): For UI display (true=AM, false=PM)

**Returns:**
- Created reminder object with ID
- `reminder_datetime`: Combined date and time
- `is_active`: true
- `is_sent`: false

request.description:
Update an existing reminder. All fields are optional.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Reminder ID

**Request Body (all optional):**
- `title`: Updated title
- `note`: Updated note
- `reminder_date`: Updated date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `reminder_time`: Updated time (HH:mm)
- `frequency`: Updated frequency
- `is_active`: Set to false to deactivate
- `is_am`: Updated AM/PM indicator

**Note:** If date or time is updated, `is_sent` is automatically reset to false.

item.description: User endpoints for managing personal reminders. All endpoints require authentication.

item.name: Admin Operations

request.description:
Manually trigger processing of pending reminders.

**Access:** Admin or Super Admin only

**Process:**
1. Finds reminders due in next 5 minutes
2. Sends push notifications
3. Marks one-time reminders as sent
4. Reschedules recurring reminders

**Returns:**
- Number of reminders processed
- Number of successful sends
- Number of failed sends

**Note:** This runs automatically every minute in the background. Use this endpoint for manual testing or troubleshooting.

query.description: Remove reminders older than this many days (default: 30)

request.description:
Clean up old completed one-time reminders.

**Access:** Admin or Super Admin only

**Query Parameters:**
- `older_than_days` (optional): Remove reminders older than this many days (default: 30)

**Process:**
- Only affects one-time reminders
- Only affects sent reminders
- Sets `is_active` to false

**Returns:**
- Number of reminders cleaned up
